short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cashrewards Notifier is the ultimate shopping partner to access cashback deals from over 2000 stores online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It’s so easy. 
When the Notifier appears for a store, click “Activate now” to track your shop and let the savings roll in. 

Leading Australian and international brands.
With cashback offers for over 2000 stores to choose from including Apple, Amazon, Petbarn and The Iconic you can build your cashback balance quickly and use it however you wish! Simply withdraw to your bank or PayPal account.

Cashback and coupons.
You don’t need to go searching for discount codes because when you shop with Cashrewards you get cashback as well as coupon codes for your favourite brands. 

Stack your savings.
Our Notifier will apply the highest eligible cashback rate for that store at that time to your shopping PLUS you will often receive any sales, discounts or loyalty points offered by the store or your card provider on top of cashback from us. 

The Cashrewards Rewards Notifier is for the savvy shopper who wants the best value every time they shop online.

Download the Extension and sign up to Cashrewards today.

Privacy policy: https://www.cashrewards.com.au/en/privacy
Terms and conditions: https://www.cashrewards.com.au/terms-and-conditions
